name: Base Defender (Yuhao Harry Gao)
description:
Hi guys,  welcome to Base Defender, the attacker has to send troops to the defender's base.

Both player use S/Left Arrow and F/Right Arrow to move between the lanes.

Top player:

You generate 1 energy/sec, use to call in troops, you can store no more than 10 energy.

E to choose different troops, soldier(cost 1 energy), APC(cost 3 energy), Tank(cost 5 energy), and Goliath(cost 7 energy), the higher the energy cost, the higher their Health point is.

D to send troops in the selected lane.

Bottom Player:

Up Arrow to choose different ammo type, if the troop has an orange sign, use the normal ammo(orange), if the troop has an red sigh, use the AP ammo(Red)

Hold and release Down Arrow to shoot the cannon, the longer you press, the more powerful the bullet becomes.
